attributes.action: Increase funding for mental health and learning disability support in education
attributes.additional_details: We want mental health and learning disability support to receive more funding as we believe the services provided through education are inadequate and do not provide the support that students need. Furthermore, we think access to support for these students is too limited. We think this area needs to receive more funding and things need to change.
attributes.background: We want the Government to fund more support for students with mental health struggles and learning disabilities. I don't think the current programmes in place are offering the necessary help. The Government should increase the funding for support in these areas.

departments.name: Department of Health and Social Care

signatures_by_constituency.name: Kingston upon Hull West and Hessle
